entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8 except plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High 8 except plus 1 along parts of the coast. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries and rain showers beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of rain showers later in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023
